hymn.title: Arise, my soul, arise (Alternate Tune)
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Reconciled to God

layout.singingstanza: A -- rise, my soul, a -- rise! Shake off thy guilt -- y fears; The bleed -- ing Sa -- cri -- fice In my be -- half ap -- pears. Be -- fore the throne my Sure -- ty stands; My name is writ -- ten on His hands. My name is writ -- ten on His hands.

lyrics.stanza: Arise, my soul, arise! Shake off thy guilty fears; The bleeding Sacrifice In my behalf appears. Before the throne my Surety stands; My name is written on His hands. My name is written on His hands.

He ever lives above For me to intercede, His all-redeeming love, His precious blood to plead. His blood was shed for all our race, And sprinkles now the throne of grace. And sprinkles now the throne of grace.

Five bleeding wounds He bears, Received on Calvary; They pour effectual prayers; They strongly speak for me. Forgive him, O forgive, they cry, Nor let that ransomed sinner die! Nor let that ransomed sinner die!
The Father hears Him pray, His dear anointed One; He cannot turn away The presence of His Son. His Spirit answers to the blood, And tells me I am born of God. And tells me I am born of God.
To God I'm reconciled, His pardoning voice I hear; He owns me for His child, I can no longer fear. With confidence I now draw nigh, And Father, Abba, Father, cry. And Father, Abba, Father, cry.
